name: Brian Racing: The Game
description:
Racing cars has been the standard for years. But now is the time for a revolution! Golf Cart racing is the new standard; do you have what it takes?

*Note: This game is a prototype. Not all features are guaranteed to work as intended.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Press "Esc" at any time while racing to return to the main menu.

Click on the golf cart on the main menu to change its color.

Driving Controls:

Player 1: W, A, S, D

Player 2: T, F, G, H

Player 3: I, J, K, L

Player 4: Arrow Keys

"Why is it called Brian Racing: The game?"

I made this game in my computer science class in 11th grade. My friend, Brian, was sitting next to me when I was trying to think of a name. As a placeholder I used "Brian Racing: The Game", but the name stuck ever since.

This game was made by Justin Nauta using C# in the Unity engine.
